resources.string: EasyWorker

EasyWork is a Company and HR system mobile app that can help SME and Entrepreneur to boost their office work efficiency and help them to save cost. How to start a company with EasyWork? Invite your colleagues / employees to join your company on EasyWork. More colleagues more fun and progressive. Let’s start to invite. Here is step by step guide on “Colleagues Invitation Guide”.
Q3 How does the rewerd feature work?

Rewards Feature on EasyWork allows you to reward your employees/team members with points as a recognition. Value of the each point is self determined by your company. Rewards feature allows you to allocate recurring points to your employees/team members to reward their peers. Click on this guide to learn how to Set, Give and Spend reward points.
Q4 WILL MY SUBSCRIPTION BE AUTO RENEWED?
Yes, all subscription will be auto renewed once the billing term is up.
Q2 How do i invite colleagues to join EasyWorker?
A easy worker referal code ( or referal tracking code) is a unique combination of numbers and letters used to identify the participants in a easy worker referal program

You can change your phone number from profile section after verifying it with an OTP
You can check your saved addresses using the following ways:
1. While selecting the location on the app home screen
2. Check address on the checkout screen before making payment
Alternatively, you can also click on the below link to check all saved addresses:
You can change your email address from the profile section after verifying with an OTP
Where can i see my saved payment details?
You can check all your saved payment details by clicking the below button.
If you wish to remove any saved payment details, you can either unlike wallet account or delete the saved cards.
What is EasyWorker?
How to place a booking?
Can I re-book the same professional if i like their service?
How to book my preferred professional?
Do I have to order a minimum value of service before I can place the booking
Does EasyWorker charge any cancellation fees?
You can follow the below steps to book a service on app:
1. Search for the service on the home screen for the category you are looking for.
2. Open the category and follow the instructions as you proceed ahead.
3. Once you have booked a service, wait for the professional to get assigned. Professional will be assigned 1 hour prior to your booking time.
4. Assigned professional will reach your address at the time of the booking and will deliver the service
Yes if you rate their service with five stars, you will get an option to re-book with the same professional the next time you book. Click on their profile and secure their slots.
If you have already taken the service & rated the professional above 4 stars, You can book your preferred professional by:
1. Adding services in your cart
2. Selecting your preferred professional from the list of professionals
3. Proceed with placing the booking

If the slots of your preferred professionals are not available, please proceed with placing the booking and we will try to assign you the best professional available. All our professionals are training to deliver a high quality experience.
To ensure efficient use of our professional\'s time, there are minimum order requirements for each category
If the services you\'ve selected does noy meet the minimum order requirement, you will be prompted to add more services before you can proceed to checkout.

Cancellation fee is charged only if a professional is assigned on your booking and the time of cancellation is closer to your booking time. This is done to fairly compensate our professionals for their time and the cost of travel while travelling to your place.
Exact cancellation amount will be shown while your proceed with a cancellation request.
How do i check my wallet balance?
How do i use my EasyWorker credits?
Can I extends the validity of the rewards?
How does referral work?
I have not received a reward for referral
Where can I see my saved payment details?
You can check you wallet balance from balance from your profile section->My wallet.
To Check you wallet history
Usage of EasyWorker credits applies to specific services
For more details you may check by accessing our mobile app > profile > my wallet.
Activate the usages of your credits at the cart summary page before checking out!
No, the validity of the rewards or EasyWorker credits cannot be extended. Please use the credits before their validity expire
To be eligible for the referral reward, you have to fulfil the below requirements:
1. Your friend must be a first-time user of EasyWorker Company
2. Download our mobile app and register via your referral link
3. Account details must have a verified mobile number
Once your friend takes service with us, they will get instant 100Rs off and ypu can win upto 5000Rs in rewards.
You are eligible for referral reward when:
1. You referral is first-time user on EasyWorker app
2. They have successfully availed at least 1 service from us
Your reward will be credited within 24 hours of service delivery.
You can check all your saved payment details by clicking the below button.
If you wish to remove any saved payment details, you can either unlike wallet account or delete the saved cards.

EasyWorker Company is Prayagraj Largest online home services marketplace. It will start in 2022–23 by Aman Kesarwani(founder), Shubham Singh, Himanshu Tripathi & Abhishek Singh.
We will operate in Prayagraj, Lucknow, Noida.
Go to wallet
To check the validity of your rewards
Know more about safety and Covid-19 measures
How do i check if a professional is vaccinated?
We have taken the following precautionary actions with regards to safety and COVID-19.
1. Providing PPE kits(mask, gloves and sanitisers) free of cost to all our professionals
2. Daily monitoring of body temperatures
3. Single-use products and disposables in beauty and wellness services
4. Vaccination of all our professionals
5. COVID-19 testing of symptomatic professionals
On a booking screen, you can tap on the professional\'s profile. On the profile page you can view vaccination certificate and their temperature details.
A host of benefits are included in easy worker membership:
1. Discounts upto 20% on every order
2. Top-rated plus professionals assigned on every service
3. Free-repair visits upto Rs 300
4. Zero visitation charge on booking any top rated professional
You get a maximum discount of Rs 300 on each booking
There\'s no limit on the number of bookings under the membership. But as per our fair usage policy, the total discount you can avail is limited to 8 times the membership price paid.
If you don\'t have the easy worker plus membership and want to know more, please click on the below button.
If a easy worker plus member saves fees the membership price, we refund the remaning balance easy cash. The refund calculated at the end of membership period.
To buy easy worker membership:
1. Select the service of your choice
2. During checkout you have an option to between annual and half-yearly membership plans
3. Once your booking is placed successfully, Easy worker plus membership will be activated
Please note that the membership can only be activated when payment is made online.
No, the membership can only be activated when payment is made online
Once the membership is activated, you can place the next set of bookings using Cash on Delivery method as well.
Only you can avail benefits of the easy worker Plus membership as it is linked with your account only.
However, you can the book the service for others from your account and still receive same benefits under name.
If you don\'t have easy worker plus membership and want to subscribe for it, please check:
EasyWorker Plus membership once activated, cannot be cancelled.

We offer you a money back guarantee with this membership. If you are unable to avail discounts equal to the price of the membership., we refund the different as easy worker credit in the wallet at the end of membership period.
No, the membership, once activated cannot be paused.

We offer you a money back guarantee with this membership. If you are unable to avail discounts equal to the price of the membership, we refund the difference as easy worker credits in the wallet at the end of membership period.
